Account name: ATU LeMoyne Smith School of Business
Description:
Internship Spotlight 💼 | HR @ @choctawnationok 

@wapiti_hunter_oak_mefford just wrapped up an incredible internship with the Choctaw Nation of Oklahoma (and earned course credit along the way). 👏🏼

His advice for students looking for internships?
✅ Start early
✅ Don’t count yourself out
✅ Network and follow up

“A lot of internships are more about your willingness to learn and your attitude than your experience.”

Super proud of the work he accomplished this summer and the initiative it took to get there! 💚💛

🔗 Want to land your own for-credit internship? @atucareers can help you build your resume, prep for interviews, and connect to internships and jobs through Handshake (not just as a student, but even after you graduate - a resource for life). 

#ATUbusiness #GoodAsGold #ChoctawNation #HR #Internship #collegelife #intern #humanresources

@scoutgracee is a junior in our tourism program with a natural resource emphasis, AKA your go-to guide for life at ATU and in The Natural State because she is our newest Good as Gold Ambassador! 💎

From state parks to the US Forest Service, Sadie is learning how to manage parks, steward outdoor spaces, and create unforgettable experiences for visitors. Whether it’s trail design, interpretive programming, or leading environmental education, she’s gaining hands-on skills through real partnerships across Arkansas.

Want a major rooted in the outdoors? Come find your place at A Tree U 💚💛

Account name: THM Business School, Gießen
Description:
🇺🇸🤝🇩🇪 Gießen Week Part 1 – Ein gelungener Abschluss!
Kicking off the second half of an unforgettable international exchange!
Die zweite Woche startete mit einer spannenden Exkursion nach Frankfurt: Zuerst ein Besuch bei der Europäischen Zentralbank, anschließend ein Einblick in das Börsengeschehen. 💶📈
Am Abend ging es zum gemeinsamen Abendessen nach Sachsenhausen – ein perfekter Abschluss für den Tag. 🍽️🌇
Am letzten Tag präsentierten die Gruppen ihre Abschlussprojekte 🎤, bevor es mittags nach Marburg zur Stadtführung ging. Den emotionalen Abschluss bildete die feierliche Zertifikatsverleihung beim gemeinsamen Abendessen an der Lahn. 🎓🌿
Und dann hieß es auch schon: Abschied nehmen – mit vielen neuen Eindrücken, Erfahrungen und Freundschaften im Gepäck. 🌍❤️
Ein großes Dankeschön an alle, die diese besondere Woche möglich gemacht haben!

🇺🇸 English Version

🇺🇸🤝🇩🇪 Gießen Week Part 1 – Wrapping up an amazing week!
Kicking off the second half of an unforgettable international exchange!
The second week began with an exciting excursion to Frankfurt: first a visit to the European Central Bank, followed by a stop at the stock exchange. 💶📈
In the evening, the group enjoyed a traditional dinner in Frankfurt’s Sachsenhausen district – a great way to end the day. 🍽️🌇
On the final day, the student groups presented their project results 🎤, followed by a city tour through Marburg. The official closing dinner by the river Lahn included the certificate ceremony – and a heartfelt farewell. 🎓🌿
Time to say goodbye – but everyone leaves with lasting memories, valuable experiences, and new friendships. 🌍❤️
Huge thanks to everyone who made this inspiring week possible!

#GießenWeek #ATUinGießen #InternationalExchange #FacultyOfBusiness #THMInternational #studiereningiessen #thmbusiness #thm #thmbusinessschool

Fotos: Sophie Hopp, Malik Schleher, Maria Möller und Sophia Schweitzer

Account name: THM Business School, Gießen
Description:
🇺🇸🤝🇩🇪 Gießen Week Part 1 – Ein gelungener Start!

Kicking off an inspiring week full of exchange, teamwork and unforgettable moments!

Am Mittwoch, den 11.06., durften wir unsere Gäste von der Arkansas Tech University im Rahmen der “Gießen Week” herzlich willkommen heißen! Nach einem gemeinsamen Frühstück und der Begrüßung durch unseren Dekan Prof. Dr. Jens Klose ging es direkt an die Projektarbeit. 💼🌍

Am Donnerstag erkundeten die Studierenden bei einer Stadtrallye Gießen, bevor unser Präsident Prof. Dr. Matthias Willems persönlich begrüßte. Am Nachmittag stand ein Besuch der Leica Welt in Wetzlar auf dem Programm und abgerundet durch einen entspannten Abend im Restaurant an der Lahn. 📷🍽️🌿

Der Freitag begann akademisch mit einem spannenden Vortrag von Prof. Dr. Jens Klose. 🎤📚

Das waren nur einige Highlights – Part 2 folgt! 📸

⸻

🇺🇸 English Version 

🇺🇸🤝🇩🇪 Gießen Week Part 1 – A Great Start!
Kicking off an inspiring week full of exchange, teamwork and unforgettable moments!

On Wednesday, June 11, we had the pleasure of welcoming our guests from Arkansas Tech University as part of the “Gießen Week.” After a shared breakfast and a warm welcome by our Dean, Prof. Dr. Jens Klose, the students jumped right into collaborative project work. 💼🌍

Thursday began with a city rally through Gießen, followed by a short visit from our University President, Prof. Dr. Matthias Willems. In the afternoon, the group visited the Leica World in Wetzlar and ending the day with a relaxed dinner at a restaurant by the river Lahn. 📷🍽️🌿

Friday kicked off with an academic highlight: a lecture by Prof. Dr. Jens Klose. 🎤📚

And that’s just the beginning – Part 2 is coming soon! 📸

#thm #thmbusiness #studiereningiessen #GießenWeek #InternationalExperience #ATUinGießen #HessenMeetsArkansas #THMInternational #LeicaWorld #TeamWorkAcrossBorders #GlobalExchange

Fotos: Sophie Hopp und Sophia Schweitzer

✨ Meet Elis, one of our newest Good as Gold Ambassadors 💛 Originally from Russia, she defines bravery as leaving everything familiar to chase something greater.

When asked what inspires her, she said:
“I’m inspired by other international students who face challenges like separation from family, language barriers, and cultural differences to get a good education.” 🌍📚 

Whether it’s a return or a return on investment, she’s got it handled 🎾 Welcome to the team, @elis.gergel! We’re so glad you’re here!

Account name: THM Fachschaft Wirtschaft
Description:
Who knew one week could mean so much?
International Business Simulation Blended 749 – the second part of this incredible journey, the Gießen Week, with the amazing students from ATU Arkansas has been nothing short of unforgettable.
We came in as strangers and left as friends. In just a few days, we created memories that feel like they’ve been building for years.
So much laughter, deep talks, culture, connection, and shared dreams(and of course some tears at the end).
There’s a special kind of magic when people from different places come together and feel this seen, this supported, this connected.

All that’s left to feel is: gratitude. humanity. unity.🌍💛💚 

See you later! Bis später!

Account name: ATU LeMoyne Smith School of Business
Description:
If you’ve been at @arkansastech for more than five minutes, you probably know @nikki_victory 🙌🏼

This Junior Business Management and Digital Marketing major is already making waves, and now she’s adding Good as Gold Ambassador to her resume. 💚💛

We asked: “What’s one thing you wish more students knew about the College of Business and Economic Development?”

Nikki told us: “I wish more students knew just how fun the events were. You don’t have to be a business major to participate. You meet so many cool people and can even win amazing prizes.”

Let’s just say... the gold standard keeps rising. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

#GoodAsGold #HeckYeahTechYeah #ATUbusiness #CollegeLife

Account name: ATU LeMoyne Smith School of Business
Description:
Step inside Dreami Tea and you’ll find more than boba💛

You’ll find a small business rooted in generosity, belonging, and hope.

Founded by an ATU alumna with a dream to give back, Dreami Tea offers support to students who aren’t eligible for scholarships, opens its doors to small entrepreneurs, and hosts a community calendar full of events, movie screenings, book clubs, and more.⭐️

This space is proof that one person’s dream can uplift an entire town. This is your sign to stop by, sip something sweet, and feel at home. 🧋

Tomorrow is CATURDAY at Dreami Tea. Show them a picture of a rescue cat at checkout to receive 10% off your order 😻

#DreamiTea #Boba #Russellville #ShopSmall #ShopLocal #WomenInBusiness #ATU  #ArkansasEntrepreneurs #GiveBack #SmallBusiness #SmallBusinessOwner #ATUbusiness

Description:
Remember when a handmade card was the ultimate Mother’s Day gift? 🥹

Some of our students brought that tradition back this week because no matter how grown up we get, we never outgrow needing our moms.

To every mom, stepmom, grandma, aunt, and mother figure, we’re grateful for all the love you give. And with graduation just behind us, this one feels extra special. We know who helped get our grads here.

Tag your mom (or your biggest supporter) and tell her how much she means to you.

Happy Mother’s Day from all of us at the College of Business and Economic Development 💗
